```{r, results='hide'}

library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(tidyverse)

library(readxl)

```

```{r, results='hide'}
#| label: load_spacial_data
us_states <- us_states()
us_congressional_2022 <- st_read(file.path("data/congressional_districts.shp"))
```

```{r, results='hide', fig.width=10, fig.height=5}
#| label: plot_spacial_data

ggplot() +
    geom_sf(
        data = us_congressional_2022,
        fill = "#E2E2E2",
        show.legend = FALSE
    ) +
    labs(
      title="United States House of Representatives Congressional District Map"
    )
```
